ThingDef.label: Borg Item Converter
ThingDef.description: A borg adapted station designed to develop some of the more advanced technologies of this collective. Contains all of the necessary data and manufacturing tools to create.

ThingDef.label: Borg Raw Food Converter
ThingDef.description: A borg adapted station designed to develop some of the more advanced technologies of this collective. Contains all of the necessary data and manufacturing tools to create.

ThingDef.label: Borg Resource Converter
ThingDef.description: A borg adapted station designed to develop some of the more advanced technologies of this collective. Contains all of the necessary data and manufacturing tools to create.

ThingDef.label: Borg Manufactured Material Converter
ThingDef.description: A borg adapted station designed to develop some of the more advanced technologies of this collective. Contains all of the necessary data and manufacturing tools to create.

ThingDef.label: Borg machining station
ThingDef.description: A borg adapted station designed to develop some of the more advanced technologies of this collective. Contains all of the necessary data and manufacturing tools to create.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Starship station
ThingDef.description: Nanoprobes use substrate to produce advanced ship parts for interplanetary travel at this station. Produced ship parts are minified and need to be placed at their desired location.

ThingDef.label: Starship station
ThingDef.description: Nanoprobes use substrate to produce basic ship parts for obital travel at this station. Produced ship parts are minified and need to be placed at their desired location.

ThingDef.label: adapted borg research bench
ThingDef.description: A high-tech bench with computers and electronic measurement equipment adapted by nanite infusions and incorporating several pieces of borg technology throughout. Research is sped up by the high-tech tools. Requires power.

ThingDef.label: borg power coupling
ThingDef.description: A borg device used to maintain power flow, providing a small degree of radiated heat and light to an area.

ThingDef.label: adapted power conduit
ThingDef.description: A bundle of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.

ThingDef.label: Borg Cybernetic Battery
ThingDef.description: Borg cybernetic batteries utilize organic components infused with borg nanites to store electrical energy as organic chemical energy. Borg nanite enzymes create pseudo-stable molecular organic chains. Specialized nanite catalyst can then destabilize the bonds in the organic chains to create precise amounts of energy on demand. Warning - charged batteries tend to explode when exposed to rain or fire.

ThingDef.label: borg adapted generator
ThingDef.description: Borg adapted technology has resulted in a power station capable of producing a very large amount of power for a very short period of time. Borg nanites and cybernetic components are adapted and interfaced with complex-brain neural networks, which allows for the porduction of power through quantum level resonance and mass conversion of non-baryonic matter. This process quickly degrades the neural tissue.

ThingDef.label: borg energy cell
ThingDef.description: Borg adapted technology has resulted in a power station capable of producing a very large amount of power for a very short period of time. Borg nanites and cybernetic components are adapted and interfaced with complex-brain neural networks, which allows for the porduction of power through quantum level resonance and mass conversion of non-baryonic matter. This process quickly degrades the neural tissue.

ThingDef.label: borg adapted nutrient synthesizer
ThingDef.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic feedstocks. Adapted by the borg to produce specific nutrients for the organic aspects of their bodies. Accepts raw food, but not rough plant matter like hay.

ThingDef.label: Borg Alcove(North)
ThingDef.description: A specially designed station with multiple plugs and devices for the borg to recharge their cybernetic implants. Nanites injected through the station repair and maintain the borg body while in standby mode.

ThingDef.label: Borg Alcove(South)
ThingDef.description: A specially designed station with multiple plugs and devices for the borg to recharge their cybernetic implants. Nanites injected through the station repair and maintain the borg body while in standby mode.

ThingDef.label: Borg Alcove(East)
ThingDef.description: A specially designed station with multiple plugs and devices for the borg to recharge their cybernetic implants. Nanites injected through the station repair and maintain the borg body while in standby mode.

ThingDef.label: Borg Alcove(West)
ThingDef.description: A specially designed station with multiple plugs and devices for the borg to recharge their cybernetic implants. Nanites injected through the station repair and maintain the borg body while in standby mode.

ThingDef.label: Borg Assimilation Table
ThingDef.description: An operating table where the borg can harvest and implant organs.

ThingDef.Name: Wall
ThingDef.label: wall
ThingDef.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.

ThingDef.label: column
ThingDef.description: A column capable of holding a roof. Does not block sight or movement and looks quite nice.

ThingDef.label: door
ThingDef.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.

ThingDef.label: Borg unilink
ThingDef.description: A specially designed station with multiple plugs and devices for the borg to recharge their cybernetic implants. Nanites injected through the station repair and maintain the borg body while in standby mode.

ThingDef.label: butcher table
ThingDef.description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: cooler
ThingDef.description: An air-cooling machine that fits into a wall. Cool air comes out one side, while hot exhaust comes out the other. Can be used to cool down rooms during summer, or to create a walk-in freezer.

ThingDef.label: vent
ThingDef.description: A vent for equalizing the temperature between two rooms without allowing people to walk between them.
